name: Kaido and Linlin
text: When Attacking -10 Don!!: KO all other characters. Then, put up to one card from the top of your deck on your life pile and trash up to one card from the top of your opponent's life pile.

effect.text: -10 Don!!: KO all other characters. Then, put up to one card from the top of your deck on your life pile and trash up to one card from the top of your opponent's life pile.
